channel.code:
hush()

var b = 0; 
update = () => b = (0.4* a.fft[5]);
speed = 1;

shape(20,0.2,0.3)
.color(0.5,0.8,50)
  .scale(() => b +1*2)
  .repeat(() =>b*10)
  .modulateRotate(o0)
  .scale(() => b +0.5)
  .modulate(noise(2,2))
  .rotate(1, .2)
  // .invert(2.4)
.out(o1)


shape(20,0.2,0.3)
.color(0.5,0.8,50)
  .scale(() => b +1*2)
  .repeat(() =>b*10)
  .modulateRotate(o0)
  .scale(() => b +0.5)
  .modulate(noise(2,2))
  .rotate(-1, .2)
  .invert(2.4)
.out(o2)

src(o2).diff(o1,10).out(o0)

hush()


var azero= ()=>a.fft[0]+1.5;
osc(8,-0.5, 1)
  .color(-1.5, -1.5, -1.5)
  .blend(o0)
  .rotate(-0.5, -0.5)
  .modulate(
  shape(4)
  .rotate(0.5, 0.5)
  .scale(2)
  .repeatX(2, 2)
  .modulate(o0, azero )
  .repeatY(2, 2)
).out(o0)

hush()

 
function r(min=0,max=1) { return Math.random()*(max-min)+min; }


solid(1,1,1)
  	.diff(shape([4,4,4,24].smooth().fast(.5),r(0.6,0.93),.09).repeat(20,10))
	.modulateScale(osc(8).rotate(r(-.5,.5)),.52)
	.add(
  		src(o0).scale(0.965).rotate(.012*(Math.round(r(-2,1))))
  		.color(r(),r(),r())
    	.modulateRotate(o0,r(0,0.5))
  		.brightness(.15)
  		,.7)
	.out()

hush()
   
s1.initImage("./src/resource/img/alpha.png")
a.setCutoff(4)
a.setSmooth(0.8)
src(s1).invert(1)  
  .rotate( () => time%360, () => Math.sin(time*0.1)*0.05 )
  .scroll([-0.2,0.2].smooth(),[-0.2,0.2,0.1,-0.15].smooth())
.scale(()=>1+a.fft[0])
  .out(o1)


src(o1)
	.add(
  		src(o0).scale(0.95) 
  		.brightness(.15)
  		,.7)
	.out()
